item.title: Track 1: Emotion Intelligence
item.description: Challenge Tasks Task 1: Emotion Recognition - Identify both surface and deep emotions expressed by users Task 2: Emotional Trajectory Summary - Accurately identify and concisely summarize users’ emotional changes throughout multi-turn conversations Task 3: Comprehensive Understanding and Insight - Evaluate whether models can synthesize all conversation information to provide profound explanations Task 4: Multimodal Empathy Assessment - Assess textual and audio empathy as well as naturalness Task 5: Emotional Voice Synthesis - Generate natural speech with specified emotions Among them, task 1 and task 5 are not included in the evaluation ranking and no validation sets are set for them.
